programme.title: Covering the 1980 presidential campaign
programme.short_synopsis: Is there too much news coverage of the 1980 Democratic nomination campaigns?
programme.medium_synopsis: Cooke looks back at his own coverage of previous Democratic nomination campaigns including Truman and Dewey in 1948; and the current battle between Jimmy Carter and Edward Kennedy.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
